system.description: The character and their comrade fight as one inseparable unit, covering each other's blind spots and preventing enemies from overwhelming them with numbers.
system.benefit: As long as the Character's Comrade is in Cohesion, enemies gain no bonus for outnumbering them, and they can also react to Melee Attacks even if Unaware or Surprised.

specialAbilities.name: Comrade Defense
specialAbilities.description: While your Comrade is in Cohesion: enemies gain no outnumbering bonuses against you, and you can react to melee attacks even if Unaware or Surprised.
